name: Simple Boss Battle
description:
This is my first attempt at programming a boss fight. I unfortunately didn't have alot of time this month to commit to the jam, but I'm happy I was able to get a simple boss with a few move sets working. I programmed the game in Rust. I used a library called Macroquad to do simple stuff like draw pixels and get keyboard input, but I did almost everything else in my own code.  All of the art was created before the jam for other projects. I'm glad I could participate in Boss Rush Jam!

Controls:

  • Move: LEFT and RIGHT
  • Dash: PressDOWN while holding LEFT or RIGHT
  • Jump: SPACE
  • Fire: X

Be sure to use your wall jump to dodge the boss's attacks!
